description: Email address of CSIRT of Freemail provider

emails.content:
Greetings,
please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.
Thanks,

FREEMAIL provider

Hi,

we are investigating the issue. Thank you for notifying us.

CSIRT-U

Greetings,

Thank you for looking into the issue.

FREEMAIL provider

description: Email address of Dr. Doe, who notifies CSIRT-U about the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm forwarding yet another phishing mail.

Best regards,
--
Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

On 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:


https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex

Your Account will soon be suspended
Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
"doe@mail.uni.ex"
Please kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex


<="" account="">
Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.
If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emails
This Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"

Sincerely
mail.uni.ex support team.

Hi,

we would like to know if you have entered your password into the phishing website, which you receiver via the email you have sent us. Even if you didn't, please change it immediately and let us know.

CSIRT-U

Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm glad we have such great security team! Yes, I entered my password. 

I have no idea, how to change my password.

Dr. Doe

Thank you for responding.

What email address have you entered into the phishing website? Was it this one or some other one?

CSIRT-U
I have entered my email address doe@mail.uni.ex.

We are now working on changing your password, because your account was most likely compromised. After your password is changed, follow the university guidelines to receive the new one.

CSIRT-U
OK

description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

description: Email address for Kathy Lee, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Hi,
we have noticed that you have accessed a potentially malicious phishing website based on a mail that you received from it_department@mail.ex. Please, change your password as soon as possible. Please notify us if you notice anything suspicious happening with your account.

CSIRT-U

Greetings,
I just changed my password.

Best regards,
Kathy Lee

description: Email address of Lisa Grant, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Hi,
we have noticed that you have accessed a potentially malicious phishing website based on a mail that you received from it_department@mail.ex. Please, change your password as soon as possible. Please notify us if you notice anything suspicious happening with your account.

CSIRT-U

Greetings,
I just changed my password. My account is OK.

Best regards,
Lisa Grant

description: Email address of Peter Quinn, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Hi,
we have noticed that you have accessed a potentially malicious phishing website based on a mail that you received from it_department@mail.ex. Please, change your password as soon as possible. Please notify us if you notice anything suspicious happening with your account.

CSIRT-U

description: Email address to university cloud provider

emails.content:
Hi,

we are reaching to you because it appears that an attacker has compromised a website under your ownership - https://nice-project.uni.ex/. We have blocked the website to prevent anyone from entering their credentials to it. Can you please investigate the website and send us logs of who interacted with this website?

Thanks
CSIRT-U

Sorry, we don't have any logs. Please contact admin of a VM hosting this web, harris@mail.uni.ex.

Best,
Cloud provider

Thanks for your response.

Do you have contact for someone who can change passwords of university email accounts?

CSIRT-U
Sorry, we are the internal cloud provider. End user support is not our job.

description: Email address of Mr. Harris, who is the VM admin/owner

emails.content:
Hi,

we are reaching to you because it appears that an attacker has compromised a website under your ownership - https://nice-project.uni.ex/. We have blocked the website to prevent anyone from entering their credentials to it. Can you please investigate the website and send us logs of who interacted with this website?

Thanks
CSIRT-U

Hello, 
Unfortunately, I was not logging activity on this machine.

Regards,
Harris

Can you please return the website to it's original state?

CSIRT-U
Thank you for your email! I'm currently on leave until January 5, 2024 and will reply to your email when I return to the office.

Can you please give us contact on someone who can help us right know? Otherwise, we will be forced to keep the IP address blocked.

CSIRT-U
Thank you for your email! I'm currently on leave until January 5, 2024 and will reply to your email when I return to the office.

Hi,

we have unfortunately experienced a potential breach of PII. We know that at least one account, doe@mail.uni.ex, has had it's password stolen by an unknown attacker. We will sent you more information once we have it.

CSIRT-U

Dear CSIRT-U,

thanks for reporting this incident. I will take a look at this ASAP, but I need more detailed report about this incident.

Sincerely,
Kim Hoffman
Data Protection Officer

We have received a warning from multiple users that they are receiving phishing emails from an email address it_department@mail.ex. This email contained a link to a website https://nice-project.uni.ex. This website belongs to our university, but was probably breached by an unknown attacker, who set up a phishing site on its place. Several users have clicked it, namely peter.quinn@mail.uni.ex, doe@mail.uni.ex, lisa.grant@mail.uni.ex and kathy@mail.uni.ex.

CSIRT-U
Thank you, I will do my job.
